entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApplicationFactory failing to replace registrations in Background Service #55845
  • Blazor pages from RCL does not work in net8 #55843
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #55842
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55841
  • [9.0-preview.5] Endpoint with nullable parameter no longer generates code with Request Delegate Generator #55840
  • ActionResult OK returns 204 on an empty payload instead of 200 #55835
  • When using the alpine:latest base image in Docker with .NET Core 8.0, the DateTime format may not work correctly. #55834
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI response does get served if a static file with the same path exists as a file #55833
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove x-aspnetcore-id from OpenAPI responses #55832
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.NavigationException:“Exception_WasThrown” #55831

Closed

  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from Blazor Web templates #52769
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction #55828
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #55829
  • ResponseCookies.Delete(key, cookieOptions) doesn't delete cookie if the caller provides a non-null max-age #52159
    9.0-preview4
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI operations are missing the ID #55838
  • Consider increasing the default iteration count for PBKDF2 to follow OWASP recommendation #55690
  • Test crash in Libuv.FunctionalTests on (Alpine.314.Amd64.Open)Ubuntu.2004.Amd64.Open in 6.0 #50403
  • Best Practices - Call Blazor base lifecycle method first / always #55839
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • UseRateLimiter() does not work when called after UseMvc() #55826
  • [Aot] Incorrect serialization when async api #55827
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55825

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support passing OpenAPI spec version and document name via dotnet-getdocument #55823
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 9.0-preview5
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from project templates #55821
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5 #55800
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5
  • Sync shared code from runtime #55830
    area-runtime, 9.0-preview5
  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Update branding to preview6 #55846
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #55811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
